thread.title: Kim Kardashian Addresses Rumors About an Alleged Second Sex Tape
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian Addresses Rumors About an Alleged Second Sex Tape

author: Celebuzz
title: Kim Kardashian Addresses Rumors About an Alleged Second Sex Tape
text:
MORE >> 
Kim Kardashian ’s rep gave a statement to the Daily Mail after The Mirror reported that a second sex tape of hers had leaked online. 
The Mirror’s report said that the alleged new footage of Kardashian showed “a woman appearing to be Kim in bed wearing a skimpy bra and showing off her cleavage to a man who appears to be holding the camera.” According to Kardashian, the so-called “new tape” is not new at all. 
“It’s not new – it’s the same old tape,” Kardashian’s rep told the Daily Mail , referring to her 2007 sex tape that she made with her ex Ray J . 12 Photos » 
Kardashian’s original sex tape was obtained and distributed by the adult entertainment company Vivid. She later accepted a $5 million settlement from the company in exchange for dropping her lawsuit against them. 
That same year, Kardashian and her family launched the first episode of their E! reality series, Keeping Up with the Kardashians. 
Of the sex tape, Kardashian told LOVE magazine during an interview in 2015, “If I do have one regret in life that’s it.” Advertisement
